Package translator.minionExpressionTranslator

Interface Summary
MinionTranslatorGlobals  
 

Class Summary
AtomExpressionTranslator Translates simple expressions, which are AtomicExpressions (booleans, numbers, identifiers) or NonAtomicExpressions (vector- or matrixelements).
ExpressionRepresentation  
ExpressionTranslator We assume that all expressions are fully evaluated that are assigned to the Translator.
MinionVariableCreator  
MulopExpressionTranslator Translates arithmetic and boolean expressions such as additions, substractions, disjunctions etc containing NO relations (=, <, ...) !
QuantifiedMulopExpressionTranslator  
QuantifierTranslator  
RelationalExpressionTranslator Translate relational expressions containing either boolean or arithemtic expressions.
SpecialExpressionTranslator Translates top-level binary expressions into rather smart Minion constraints: it can translate scalar products (simple sums and weighted sums), partwise scalar products and simple binary expressions that consist of at least one atom.
SubexpressionCollection  
 

Exception Summary
TranslationUnsupportedException
